entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
